message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm losing money to inflation with each round.
Alice, your cut decreases with time. Let's be practical. I'll take a little less than half to speed things up.
Bob, I'm sticking to my initial offer.  The clock is ticking and we both lose if we don't agree soon.
Alice, time is running out. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money with every second that passes!  You're getting a fair deal, take it before it's too late for both of us.
Alice, I understand the pressure of the inflation, but I also want a reasonable deal. This is my final offer. Let's close this deal and both go home with something.
